sp.simulation.game.decision

Class ChangingDecisionByMiAndSigmaImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • sp.simulation.game.decision.ChangingDecisionByMiAndSigmaImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GameDecisionService

    public class ChangingDecisionByMiAndSigmaImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements GameDecisionService
    like in ChangingDecisionByMiImpl agent is changing his decision methods with changing parameter. This time param says what chances should be for getting value above 0 out of the game. It's getting into account both Mi and Sigma (uncertain Mi and Sigma if agent has non-zero uncertainty)
